  3. The Two Sisters

Kim Hee Jin

Yoon Seo Ryeong

Introduction

The Two Sisters (Korean: 두자매) is a South Korean female duo signed with JG Star Entertainment. They released their first and only digital single, “Love Is A Macchiato”, on June 19, 2023.
